synopsis.text:
George W. Bush, Kim Jong Il, The Pope, and recent Japanese Prime Ministers, including the indomitable Junichiro Koizumi, engage in high-stakes diplomacy through intense mahjong matches in this unique and thrilling anime. With the world's peace hanging in the balance, these political figures, reimagined as mahjong masters, travel to various global locations to settle international disputes over the mahjong table.

As the former Prime Minister of Japan, Koizumi's dedication to the game is unwavering, even in the face of life-threatening obstacles. From alien-controlled ministers to weapons of mass destruction, nothing can deter him from playing his best hand. The title, "Mudazumo Naki Kaikaku" (Reform with no Wasted Draws), cleverly parodies Koizumi's own slogan, "Seiiki Naki Kaikaku" (Reform with no Sanctuary). Despite being based on real-life politicians, the characters are works of fiction, offering a fresh and entertaining twist on global diplomacy. Prepare for a wild ride as these world leaders battle it out, tile by tile, in this unconventional and captivating anime.
